name: Z
text: [When Attacking] DON!! -4 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less. Then, this Leader gains +1000 Power during this turn.

effect.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less. Then, this Leader gains +1000 Power during this turn.
